评论详情: Nice design. Covers up all the things I want covered 😊
I really like this shirt. Washes well, dries quickly. Good fit. I recommend.

评论概述: Pretty, Good but not Great fit and feel
评论详情: I like the design and color of this shirt and the color (grape) and it fit mostly according to chart, a tad big but I put it in dryer to shrink it just enough. Odd though I purchased another color as well and that shirt was larger so each shirt may be a little off. For reference I'm 5"5', 142 and 34d.  The shirt isn't as soft as I would like and it flares out at the hips a bit making mine look bigger which I do not like but overall it is good.  EDIT: I can't seem to write a separate review for the orange shirt. The color is way off on it, instead of a pretty softer peachy orange it is actually bright fluorescent orange. Not a fan of it and only keeping it because it was on clearance for a good price.
really nice, long and soft was a great buy.  true to size

I’ve had another color of these tops, same brand, for over 6 months & love it. It fits well, is comfortable & washes out nicely. I wash it on gentle/hand wash & hang to dry according to the instructions. The new top was wrinkled from packaging. I washed it & let it dry & the wrinkles didn’t come out. I’m very disappointed, but will try gentle/low ironing to see if it will smooth out.
I have 3 colors of this shirt now. Silky material that is very flattering by the design. Bring a layer with you for extra warmth.
Perfect fit, love the feel, light and soft, true to size, wish for more bright colorful design selection. Great value, quality is better than expected.

This is a really nice top. Sleeves are a little too long for me, but after a quick hem, it's great. I like to wear them with yoga pants to walk and they definitely cover the body imperfections. They're a good length for me, if fact, I bought 2 because I liked it so much.
My daughter gave me this top in a different color and I love to wear it to exercise/yoga, so I ordered another in black. Fits well and is long enough to cover most of my belly & tush!

I really like to shape of these tops. They're a nice light weight for exercising and pretty much cover my rear-end. My only issue was that I had to iron them to get the deep wrinkles out. Fortunately, after the second wash, the wrinkles stayed out.
Love this top. I get many compliments. Easy to wash and wear. Doesn’t wrinkle.
Exercise gear
I love this shirt! It is super comfortable, fun, and goes with just about anything!

This top is nice enough.  Nice line.  Ordered XL and fits as hoped it would.  I washed it and it kept its shape.This top is, however, not for me.  Don't care for the way the fabric feels against my skin.
Perfect for my workouts
Perfect fit. Soft.

评论概述: Great Quality, Fits True to Size
评论详情: This shirt is great quality for the price. It’s made with a durable, stretchy fabric. I got a few sizes larger in this top as I wanted it to be a baggier fit. I’d say I should have only sized up one. It seems to fit true to size
I love this top and wear it often.  It's ever so slightly scratchy, which is it's only minus, but it's still quite comfortable, and it's very attractive.
I wish your products came in an xtra small size, as the small runs large. I love this style and fabric

I am a plus size lady. This top is soft, stretchy for movement, does not cling or wrinkle. I get lots of compliments when I wear this top which I normally don’t get as a big woman. It travels well, no binding. It’s long enough but not baggy or slouchy. I got the pattern one and it’s a happy feeling “touch” to my clothing selection.

Last summer I was diagnosed with vitiligo, the skin condition Michael Jackson had. I noticed when I was outdoors in summer months my arms had white blotches mixed with tanned areas. I wear a large, brimmed hat to keep the sun off my neck and face, but I was looking for lightweight long-sleeved shirts to cover my arms to prevent me from uneven tanning, which makes me look like a giraffe. This shirt is comfortable and flattering. I have yet to wear it in warm weather, so it remains to be seen if it will be cool enough to wear during summer months.
Fits well and is soft and comfortable
Great quality Size fits perfectly

It seems to be a cute, flattering top.  A lot of the reviews said it runs large so I sized down from what I usually order a fitted top like that. I should have ordered my usual size. The size I ordered was too small across the chest. Also, the top that was sent had obviously been washed. It smelled liked Downey, and I hate that smell!
This print is very pretty, the shirt is very comfortable.  I've been trying to find it again but they only have it in a small here.  ☹️

评论概述: Has a nice slippery feel and is flattering to the body...
评论详情: I own half a dozen of these shirts in the sleeveless, racerback style and they have quickly become my favorite. I was so pleased to see them with long sleeves for the cooler months. I love the bright colors and the fit is nice on me. They come down low enough to cover the buttocks and the front of my body and they have a pleasant scoop neck which doesn't bother my throat area.  Very nicely done and I can wear them by themselves or under a sweater or shirt. Love the feel on my skin and the easy wash and hang dry. Great shirts for me and my lifestyle.

评论概述: Nice top for hiking and city sightseeing
评论详情: Dressy enough looking for city wear, practical enough for hiking.  Zig Zag stitching allows the top to drape nicely without clinging.  Like that I can wash and it will dry over night.  Got it in 2 colors for a 4 week  European trip

Really like the fit and fabric. I am 5’2” and 143 lbs. Medium fit perfect. I have been very disappointed with recent Amazon tunic purchases where the fabric is klingy and doesn’t lay right on the body.  Considered not ordering any more Amazon ladies tunic tops. This one is 100% better. I just ordered another one.

Color is great, design is great.  But, it's TOO CLINGY!  I ordered an XL.  It fits, but it fits like a glove, which is not a good look on a size XL body.  Sizing up is not a solution because the fabric is made like a rubber band.  The 2x will be as clingy as an XL.  This was not a good buy for me.
This fits true to size and is very soft

评论概述: Nice tunic length but runs small.
评论详情: This tunic is well made, and flattering shape if you are petite. I wear size 8, am 5’7” and 135lbs, ordered a medium and sleeves are too short, waist is too high, length is about 1-2” shorter than typical tunic length.
This is my second shirt in a different color. Breathable and perfect for exercise.

I bought 3 of these to replace 8 year old Tek Gear shirts that they no longer sell. I love how these fit, with just a little bit of waist and long sleeves. Usually women’s shirt sleeves are too short, these go down to cover my wrists. Super soft fabric. LOVE

评论概述: Kimmery Workout Tops for Women Long Sleeve Shirts for Women-Pale Orange
评论详情: I received it in a timely manner. And the shirt fit correctly. I bought it for vacation, not for working out so I will be curious how it feels when I wear it on my cruise vacation.
Fits well (XXL fit 16-18) and flattering - works on my longer torso and hides a lot of the reasons I am working out :-D. I plan on getting a few more colors of this.
Light fabric and I stayed cool
I haven't worn it out yet but it does fit well. Very pretty and good length. I think I will be wearing it as a casual and not working out.
Very nice length & color ! I bought this time in black - loved the purple -one so came back for another!

评论概述: Interesting fit but print wasn’t for me
评论详情: This fabric is slippery, tech material hence the quick dry description in the name. I really wanted to like the floral print, but when I received it I felt like it looked like a bit old lady like on me? Fit was as expected. I got an XL, and that’s my usual woman’s US size. The lines at angles stitched in added some visual interest. I think it could work better in a solid color, over stretch pants or tights. The print was just not for me.

I have a few shirts this style from other companies, and while the material is a bit on the thin side as some have commented in reviews, I found it perfect to go with leggings at work- I am a prek teacher so I need professional meets comfort and not only did it check those boxes, but I got compliments on this top the first time I wore it!
The blouse is one of my favorites. Although it was a little long in both arm length and body length, not a problem for me ( I’m 5’3”)

评论概述: Probably one of the most comfortable tops I own
评论详情: I bought this because I needed a few athletic tops for a new class I am taking that would not emphasize my tummy (and the reason I need to take the class). This should fit that bill just fine and it looks very nice. I could even wear it while out shopping with leggings if I wanted to. I only gave it four stars because I haven't actually worn it to the first class. Once I have, I may come back and re-rate it. Wish it were available in a white/light tan! I need some neutral colors.
True to size and fun
The shirt is great for working out or yoga.  Very comfortable, covers your Fanny.  Too large, order a size down would be my recommendation.

Cute top yet, I would not wear for working out. This top is polyester and actually made me sweat! I'm long waisted so I appreciated that this runs large and long. Order a size down. It may be the color I ordered but the dark Grey/ black is Not as shown in the picture, it does not have as much contrast, the angled stripe does not stand out.

Been looking for a tops to wear with my yoga pants. Needed something to cover hips but not look like a tent. This is that! These tops are feminine but nice to wear in public. I have ordered these in short sleeve and long. The color range is great along with sizing. It's so easy to get dressed now. They are also very to wash dry and wear..
Needed something long sleeve for winter workouts. Loved this one so much I bought two more!
Runs very small.  Size 14-16 curvy and XXL was too small and didn’t hang well.
This top is so pretty, perfect for fall and the right length to wear over leggings. It has washed and dried well. I ordered medium and it fits as it should.

I am 5ft, 250lbs - the material is stretchy but it wasn't flattering for my body. The arms were too long (I have short arms) and the belly of it was not as forgiving as I was hoping it to be. Wonderful quality. Just wasn't good for my body. Easy return and refund.
Love the pattern, fit and feel! Ordered a small based on reviews (I’m normally a M). Fits perfectly because of the stretchy fabric. Vibrant colors and fun print.

I’m highly impressed with this shirt. It’s long enough to cover my bottom, which I like that a lot. I love it for hiking. It’s not to tight and not to loose. Gives the body defined shape but not extremely tight. The fabric is soft and stretchy. I often find it hard to find the perfect fit shirts due to being busty. But the large was perfect for me
First time with this brand and it was exactly as described!
Fits great. Long enough to wear with leggings. Hides tummy. Flatters chest and arms. Dry fit and soft. So comfortable. If I have to work outside in the heat and sun, this is what I wear.
Fits just right for my shape. Not to full at hips and waist.  Stretch fabric and light weight.  Comfortable.

评论概述: Great fit and very very pretty purple color
评论详情: Large fits my 150 lb 5' 2" body perfectly while hiding flaws.  Terrific shade of purple brightens my skin tone.  Keeping it.
Nice fabric, cute design.

I really like this shirt.  It fits a bit tighter than I was expecting but that's probably the nature of this type of fabric.  The only thing I don't like is the sleeves are rather long and cover up most of my hands.  I've been rolling them up but they definitely roll back down as I'm exercising.
This is a great work out shirt for the colder months
I love this top! Fits perfect a love this style a pattern. I got small. Height 5’7 weight 135lbs. Highly recommend!
I like the casual style and am very happy with the choice of colors and the comfortable feel of the fabric.
I love the shirt. However, since  I am  5 ft. 1 , the sleeves were too long. So I hemmed them. But that is typical for petites.
This fits great, feels great and is beautiful
This is the third top I’ve purchased from this brand. Really like the feel of the fabric. Washes well. Only complaint is that is arrives wrinkled, but washing takes care of that right away.

评论概述: Comfortable but clingy - Great customer service!
评论详情: I'm 5'4 215lb and wanted a shirt to wear hiking in cool, damp weather. The sizing was accurate for the top part, however the material was too clingy around my hips. It wouldn't have been as noticable if the shirt wasn't so long. The material was nice and comfy. It would be great if I were skinny!  Updated and increased star rating because customer service reached out to me and was super helpful.
Love this shirt!  Fits great and feels great.
Love the style , but the color was NOT what I wanted.  Definitely did not look like the picture on-line.😞
Fit very well! Very comfortable
All above  ,I  have 3 of them
I thought it would be a soft cotton blend...it is not. It doesn't stretch and fits smaller than expected. A lot smaller. I'm not real pleased with it.
Love the material and the way it flows.  A little snug in the chest area... would suggest next size up for anyone with a large chest. Sleeves are a bit too long.

评论概述: It’s not as long as it appears in photo
评论详情: The top is soft and comfortable but hits me mid-butt. I expected it to be a little longer.

评论概述: returned because the color is off.
评论详情: Ordered what I thought would be a color in the red/plum family like a burgandy or cranberry.  This was rusty brown.  Returned it.  The fit was great and I would be interested in purchasing more tops like this if they came in some more appealing colors.

This top goes great with leggings and is a great length. I usually buy large because I like them to hang loosely and not be clingy. I am 5.7 and weigh 155. This is the third top I have bought from this company.

Comfortable, it moves with you as you go about exercise or daily chores at home or outside. The arm length is a tad short for taller than average women (same with the length of shirt itself .. would appreciate a couple more inches since reaching overhead does mean some 'exposure' I'd rather not have. all In all, I pair this with yoga pants in truck or on tractor and I'm fine for the day.

I bought this shirt for travel, and it did not disappoint.  With a nice pair of leggings, I felt well enough dressed for the airport and comfortable enough for a long in-flight nap.  The next day the shirt again was excellent for an active day of sightseeing and exploring in warm, humid St. Louis.  The light stretchy fabric kept me reasonably cool and gave me freedom and range of motion to stoop, crawl, climb and slide through the City Museum's labyrinths of caves and tunnels.
I bought this for my mom for christmas as she works out all the time. She loved it and it fit as expected.
Workmanship is very nice, length and size are perfect.  Fabric was too polyestery and shiny

I bought two of these shirts: ocean blue and black in size medium. The blue one is slightly bigger and about 1 1/2" longer. I am 5'8" tall; 130 lbs. I like the fit of the black one better. Overall, these are comfortable shirts with a flattering fit. They cover your rear, so they pair great with leggings.
Color matches photo. Material is soft. Great fit.
Size ran smaller than expected and material was a little thin

评论概述: pretty, no wrinkles, covers my tummy
评论详情: Okay, I'm 59 and not a Yoga Queen, so I needed something pretty and wrinkle-free that would hide my tummy.  This is perfect.  To be honest, I tried several other vendors who were cheaper, but ended up returning them all.  This one is cut well so it adds shape, but doesn't cling.  I'm 5'6", 170, 36C, and the XL fits great .  Love the pale-blue color.  Just ordered another one in green.

Great top for travel and regular days!  Easy wash and wear, easy pack, works well in any type of weather. When traveling time zones it's an awesome top!  the only comment that might be slightly negative would be the color choices that are available. The type of material keeps it from being a solid black but the other colors other than the Heather grey are not as packable in wardrobe minimalization and versatile options.
Like these tops, so comfortable and look great too. Wash and drip dry works. I’ve ordered 2 different colors, get compliments on both
Great fit! True to size.  (Medium fit for me at  5’3, 152 lbs)
Love the stretch fabric, it's very comfortable and the colorful design is great. I hope more designs are available in the future.
Fits well, hangs on the body properly without clinging.  Washes and dries without fuss.  Goes with alot of colors.

评论概述: Fit is good. This shirt is very thin.  You can see thru it.
评论详情: Fit is fine, but was disappointed that material is so thin.  Any bra you wear the whole thing shows.

This is the second one I've ordered. Also have the red. Colors true to what is shown. Perfect fit - nice drape that gently tapers from waist to hips. Awesome fabric that doesn't wrinkle, doesn't make me sweaty when I work out. Washes great - I just line dry. One of my closet favorites!
This is a great workout tunic. Love the length and fit.  The arms are a little too long but manageable.

I love these shirts and ended up getting a few of them. They're great for everyday use as well as workouts and yoga. I'm 62 and I prefer not to have anything tight on me when I do exercise. So THESE so are perfect. My granddaughter got one too.
I love the fit but was disappointed with the color. Says grape but looks like a navy. I just thought that grape would be more purple in color.
